title: Opinion: When IV opioids are in short supply at the hospital, who gets pain relief?
description: If IV opioids are in short supply, who gets pain relief — a teenager in agony with a crushed leg or an 80-year-old dying from cancer?
content: If IV opioids are in short supply, who gets pain relief — a teenager in agony with a crushed leg or an 80-year-old dying from cancer?
